title: Game crash on ARAM load, before the game starts
body:
My system hasn't changed since yesterday, but if I try to play ARAM the game crashes. I've had eight crashes in a row, and have repaired my install twice, as well as reset my router and attempted running the game in administrator mode.
There is no reason for this to be happening as far as I can see.

Really hope I don't get a time penalty/ban for a game failure I can't influence.

I'm not recording my games, and it's not a graphics card burn out as my other games work fine.
Currently I'm reinstalling League.

replies.body:
Heyo 
Hackworth
Hope this message finds you well.
Do a repair of your client. 
Also if that dosnt work try reinstalling it and opening a ticket with riot support including all of your logs from the client (you can easily generate these logs from the same screen you go into to repair the client)

:)
Hope this has been some help

Hey there,

If reinstalling doesn't help let me know so we can explore this issue further.
